    • mapToAccountsDto

      public static AccountsDto mapToAccountsDto(Accounts accounts, AccountsDto accountsDto)
      Parameters:
      accounts -
      accountsDto -
      Returns:
      It is map all the data from Accounts to AccountsDto with the help of the Setters and Getters methods. Simple logic it will copy all the account number,account type and branch address to the DTO to the method where is trying to invoke this method which is mapToAccountDto and this is static method.
